items.text: Hook PDF export into the UI using /api/export-pdf
Add Basic Auth UX on the frontend
OpenAI provider polish: set OPENAI_API_KEY, install openai, clarify that streaming is Ollama-only
Verify full FY2026 ICD-10-CM import and counts
Add cron-friendly ICD updater script and endpoint
Expose a UI search box that calls /api/icd-search
Ignore notes/ and data/icd10_index.json in Git; consider local encryption/retention policy
Add unit tests for postprocess and ICD search; endpoint smoke tests
Dockerfile + compose (app + Ollama), CORS domain config, healthcheck
Clipboard buttons, persist provider/model in localStorage, dedupe Objective lines, loading states
Refine instruction text per specialty; expand coverage as needed
README and .env.example with setup, routes, and usage
